body:
Hey!

My name is Haroon, I live in England, UK, and was born there. I am currently 13 years old turning 14 in November 3rd. I like playing Football, Tennis, Badminton and Rugby. When I play Minecraft, I play Competitive Objective/PvP games, I also like to build and am a pretty good builder, so hit me up if you wanna make a map! I've been playing on Avicus for nearly 1 year. You'll normally see me on Throwback. I'm currently in the team Cronus, and have been with them for a few weeks now.

If you have any questions, please ask them below and I'll answer them as soon as possible!

Back to saving Gothem guys.

Thanks 


BatMan

replies.body:
Favourite map?

A team FFA map on Throwback called 'Gladiator'

Opinions?

I don't play with you much, I've played a few scrimmages with you though and you seem like a nice guy. I've seen you in public too a sometimes. You're very helpful too, when you helped Jadsaa and I a bit with a layout for a map. You should hit me up sometime if you wanna make a map together too :) Hopefully I can get to know a bit more and we can become better friends :)

replies.body:
Hello BatMan!

It's cool to have you here on Avicus.
I have seen you in game quite often, and when you say PvP, you mean PvP.
I hope you enjoy the community here, and I hope we can be friends.
Ok, let's go to the questions!

1. What is your favorite experience on the server?
2. What are your opinions on me?
3. What are your opinions on South Korea and Greece?
4. Are you more of a sports person, or a gaming person?
5. What is your favorite food?
6. When is your birthday?
7. Who is your favorite staff member?
8. What is your favorite movie?
9. What is your favorite color?
10. What is your blood type?

That will be all!
I hope you have a great day/night, as well as a great experience with the community.
See you in game, bye!

replies.body:
Hey!

1. What is your favorite experience on the server?

Probably making new friends and meeting loads of new people

2. What are your opinions on me?

You're a very cool person, very friendly and enthusiastic. I like talking to you in-game as we have a nice conversation and you're very welcoming. I hope we can be better friends in the future, hop on TS now and then and we can talk :)

3. What are your opinions on South Korea and Greece?

Well I don't know a lot about either of them, I kno that Greece is a cool place to go on vacation with all the landmarks and the nice weather.

4. Are you more of a sports person, or a gaming person?

Probably both.

5. What is your favorite food?

Cheese Burgers :)

6. When is your birthday?

November 3rd, 2002.

7. Who is your favorite staff member?

Javipepe, WQMBATJr

8. What is your favorite movie?

Southpaw

9. What is your favorite color?

Blue
10. What is your blood type?

I don't know haha

Thanks  for all the questions, have a nice day!
see you in game :)

replies.body:
Yo Zegita! <3

1.) What's the best holiday you've been on?

When I went Dubai

2.) Favourite person on Avicus?

I have a few, Javipepe, WQMBAT, WQMBATJr, JoeVC, Ciaan and yourself of course :)

3.) Will you ever buy a rank on Avicus?

Probably

4.) Opinion on me?

Well, you're a very cool guy and I liked playing with you quite a bit and talking with you on TS. You're very good at PvP and I look up to you a bit.
